rules: Rule1: Provided that the player has tokens, the player is playing a game.
Rule2: Either the player has sufficient tokens or the player purchased tokens.
Rule3: In the event that the player purchased tokens, if tokens are available to the player, then the player can play the game.

Rule4: If staff assistance is available at the arcade, then should it not be the case that having sufficient tokens implies that token availability allows the player to play the game, the game is unavailable.
Rule5: Whenever the player has a valid membership, the player has VIP status.
Rule6: Either the player has a valid membership or the player has a daily pass.
Rule7: In the event that the player has a daily pass, granting access to the player for the game leads to the game being playable.
Rule8: Provided that the player receives membership benefits, if access to the game is granted to the player, the game is playable.
Rule9: If the player has priority access, then the player receives membership benefits.
Rule10: Whenever the player is playing a game, access to the game is granted to the player.
Rule11: In the event that the player has VIP status, the player has priority access.
Rule12: If the player inserted a coin, then the player playing the game implies the game is playable.
Rule13: Either the player inserted a coin or the player won a free play.
Rule14: Either the arcade is in maintenance mode, or the player winning a free play implies that playing the game makes the game playable.
Rule15: Provided that the game is running, the game is playable.
Rule16: If the game's controls are functional, then the game is running.
Rule17: In the event that the player can play the game, if the player is playing a game, the game's controls are functional.
Rule18: Whenever the player unlocked a high score, the player can play the game.
Rule19: Either the player unlocked a high score or tokens are available to the player.
facts: Fact2: Staff assistance is available at the arcade.
Fact3: It is not the case that the game is unavailable.
Fact4: The arcade is not in maintenance mode.
